description.value:
Trigger You use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Intercept Attack] against a melee Strike and are adjacent to the creature that made the Strike.

With the might of your armor behind you, you hit back at a foe who would dare try to hurt your allies. After Intercepting the Attack, make your own Strike against the triggering enemy. If your Strike hits, you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Taunt] the target; this Taunt gains the visual trait.
